## ScriptHostOptions.initTimeout property

The interval, in milliseconds, that is allowed to elapse when the sandbox is initialized.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
initTimeout?: number;
```

## Remarks

The default value is `defaultTimeout`<!-- -->.
